article_title: IRS tax filing deadline is near
article_text:
The deadline to file your taxes is less than a month away.

And with all the pressure mounting, one of the challenges for many people is the Affordable Care Act.

This is the first time people are being asked if they had health insurance during 2014.

You have until April 15 to file your tax return, or you can file an extension that will give you time until August 15.

article_metadata.description: The deadline to file your taxes is less than a month away.
article_metadata.author: Matt McGovern
